name: Ideation / Pairwise Comparison
description:
There are THREE stages to this particular process, the Ideation stage, Pairwise Comparison stage, and the Summary stage.

  1. The IDEATION stage can be used for generating one or more responses to any prompt.
  2. The PAIRWISE COMPARISON stage can be used for comparing responses from the IDEATION stage.
  3. The SUMMARY stage is to send the full list of ranked results to someone(s).

stages.name: Ideation Stage
stages.description: At this stage, each participant will be asked to provide responses to a given prompt, defined in this form, and limited to the number of responses set here, and the amount of time.

expectedInputs.placeholder: e.g. What is your definition of Collective Intelligence?
expectedInputs.label: What is the prompt you would like to give participants, to reflect on and respond to?
What is the maximum number of responses you would like to allow from each participant?
How many minutes would you like to leave for participants to submit their responses?

stages.name: Pairwise Comparison Stage
stages.description: At this stage, get participants to compare statements ideated in the first stage.

expectedInputs.label: What text would you share to explain what a vote for one or the other option in the comparisons means?
expectedInputs.placeholder: e.g. Select the statement you prefer more

expectedInputs.label: How many minutes would you like to leave for participants to submit their reactions?

stages.name: Summary Stage
stages.description: At this stage, particular people can be sent the voted upon results of the ideation of everyone.
